name: Jappy
description:
CONTROLS: WAD to move, press R at any time to quit to the main menu

This is the story of Jappy trying to get to his picnic with Jacci, you may find it hard or you may not find it hard how would I know.

Soundtrack made with the Samplified Chill Keys Sample Pack: Chill Keys Sample Pack | Samplified

Support is appreciated : )
